clues.question: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew reports.)  I'm standing on Omaha Beach, so I'm on the coast of this historic French province

finalJeopardy.clue: Starting in the 300s B.C., Hellenistic civilization was spread from this land where a new country was declared in 1991
